author: NewsBreak Original
title: WATCH: Dog Nearly Swept Out to Sea in Huge Waves Battering California Coastline
text: Video footage captured a dog battling the surf as it was nearly swept out to sea by the massive waves that have been slamming into the Pacific Coast this week. The pup can be seen on the video, posted by KSBW , struggling to jump through the surf rushing away from the beach before getting knocked sideways and swept away into another breaker where it disappeared under the water for a few moments. In the background, a person calls out: "Oh, no. Oh, no, no." Suddenly the dog's head can be seen above the water as another breaker carries it to shore in a turbulent swell near Santa Cruz, along California's northern coastline Deposited on the beach, the dog begins shaking the water from its fur when another enormous wave crashes in an explosion of white surf. The dog disappears again for several seconds before emerging in the foaming swell that propels it to a roadway about 30 feet away. Swept onto the road, the animal finally makes a bee-line for dry land. The National Weather Service had issued warnings of high surf along the California coast on Thursday that could create waves as high as 40 feet in some areas. “The ocean is NOT your friend today!” the National Weather Service in the Bay Area warned. The massive swells caused by a storm in the Pacific flooded areas, closed roads, and forced evacuations. People were warned to stay away from coastal areas, as well as jetties, piers, and rocks by the water. Other footage captured rogue waves slamming the rocks near where two children were watching the breakers on Thursday, sweeping them into a bush. They were not injured. The high surf warnings were suspended on Friday, but nasty weather is predicted to return on Saturday.

organizations.name: huge waves battering california coastline video

author: 小浪财讯
title: 180ESGETF（510990）跌0.77%，半日成交额156.48万元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，180ESGETF（510990）跌0.77%，报0.903元，成交额156.48万元。180ESGETF（510990）重仓股方面， 贵州茅台 截止午盘涨0.00%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 中国平安 跌0.93%， 紫金矿业 跌1.44%， 长江电力 跌0.33%， 兴业银行 跌0.08%， 中信证券 跌1.55%， 工商银行 涨0.14%， 恒瑞医药 跌0.66%， 中芯国际 跌0.23%。
180ESGETF（510990）业绩比较基准为中证180ESG指数收益率，管理人为工银瑞信基金管理有限公司，基金经理为李锐敏，成立（2021-06-18）以来回报为-9.13%，近一个月回报为0.40%。
